channel.title: Change the direction NPC's Face eg. North South +1 -2
channel.description:
Change the direction NPC's Face eg. North South +1 -2
Could Some Write a new autospawn or tell me a soultion to this problem running a 317 triforce scape

item.title: Change the direction NPC's Face eg. North South +1 -2
item.dc:creator: @Shadowspkin Shadowspkin
item.description:
@Shadowspkin wrote:

The problem is in your autospawn.cfg find the npc make sure he is in right coords so it should kinda of look like this…

Npc name: (What the name is) (x) (y) (1-4 (i believe this determines were the npc faces) (And i think there is another one here should be 1-4 same thing as last one just tinker around with last 2 and it should fix it)

Read full topic
item.source: Change the direction NPC's Face eg. North South +1 -2
